This isn't a personal opinion, it is a fact based on global opinions. 
Tier 1: Old IITs (Madras, Delhi, Kanpur, etc.), BITS (Pilani only, IIIT (Hyderabad, Allahabad, Bangalore), some NITs (Trichy, Surathkal, etc.).

Tier 2: Remaining NITs, IIITs, BITS campuses. 
Tier 2.5?: MIT Manipal, VIT Vellore, SRM, etc., RVCE and MSRIT would come under this too

Tier 3: PESU, BMS, Dayanand Sagar (in Karnataka)

A good detailed realistic list can be found here: 
[Choosing Engineering College ](https://workat.tech/general/article/choosing-engineering-college-branch-ageyubs2sxip)
